It was a fascinating evening !

I've felt a kinship with Woody because he is tortured by existential dilemmas as am I .

The Russian was just being Russian- a socialist with right wing tastes . I actually liked him .
The wife was being a mother to Woody . I think he's needed that all his life .

I will meet you at the Bowery at 230 PM
